name: Music Carpet
description:
Team Name

RANA

Gameplay Instructions

KeyBoard & Mouse

WASD-Movement

Mouse - Look around

Left Mouse Button-Shooting

Space Bar-Jumping

ESC- Quit Game

Game Concept

    When the player rides the flying carpet on the road, they will make different sounds and randomly change the color on the road, like an endless song, like something we haven't done a long time ago...

    If there is a chance, do we want to restart 2020? The path we take will eventually change us.

Game Goals

Pick Up Pills- Increase Health

Target that can be shot-Increase Time/ Score/Speed...

When your remaining time is 0, the game will end. When your health value is 0, the current level will be restarted When you accidentally fall from the ground, you will return to the main menu
